code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Carousel(_ref){let{items}=_ref;const isMobile=window.innerWidth<768;const itemsPerPage=isMobile?2:8;const[index,setIndex]=useState(0);const maxIndex=Math.ceil(items.length/itemsPerPage)-1;const next=()=>setIndex(prev=>Math.min(prev+1,maxIndex));const prev=()=>setIndex(prev=>Math.max(prev-1,0));const currentItems=items.slice(index*itemsPerPage,index*itemsPerPage+itemsPerPage);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid",children:currentItems.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:item.poster,alt:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:item.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:item.description})]})]},item.title))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:"10px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"category-button",onClick:prev,disabled:index===0,children:"\u2190"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"category-button",onClick:next,disabled:index===maxIndex,children:"\u2192"})]})]});}export default Carousel;
